title: Closure tests cause Illegal instruction 4 on Mac
body:
Darn macos

```
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O0  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O0  (test for excess errors)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O1  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O1  (test for excess errors)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O2  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O2  (test for excess errors)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O3 -g  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O3 -g  (test for excess errors)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -Os  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -Os  (test for excess errors)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O2 -flto -flto-partition=none  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O2 -flto -flto-partition=none  (test for excess errors)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O2 -flto  (internal compiler error: Illegal instruction: 4)
FAIL: rust/execute/torture/closure1.rs   -O2 -flto  (test for excess errors)
```

_Originally posted by @philberty in https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/issues/1608#issuecomment-1285813959_
